question:
Unnat Bharat Abhiyan:
  1. is an initiative under Ministry of Ayush
  2. aims to provide quality hospital care and treatment of common ailment to BPL familes in rural area
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: <u>First statement is incorrect</u> because Unnat Bharat Abhiyan is a programme under Ministry of Human Resource Development (MHRD). <u>Second statement is incorrect</u> because Unnat Bharat Abhiyan has an aim to connect institutions of higher education, including Indian Institutes of Technology (IITs), National Institutes of Technology (NITs) and Indian Institutes of Science Education & Research (IISERs) etc. with local communities to address the development challenges through appropriate technologies.
